entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
